If you're getting the"please insert FS2004 Disc 2004" error:
1.go to http://www.gamecopyworld.com/games/pc_flight_simulator_2004.shtml
2. download the no/cd crack.
3.replace the original "fs9" file with the one you just downloaded.
4. double click the new "fs9" file.
5.enjoy
